requirement.hlr: i want to create a login button

user_stories.title: User can log in with email and password
user_stories.description: As a registered user, I want to log in using my email and password so that I can access my personal dashboard.
acceptance_criteria: Given that I am a registered user, when I enter my valid email and password, then I should be redirected to my dashboard.
Given that I am a registered user, when I enter an invalid email or password, then I should see an error message.
definition_of_done: Login functionality is implemented and tested.
Unit tests for login functionality are written and passing.
Code for login functionality is reviewed and approved.

user_stories.title: User can see 'Forgot Password' option
user_stories.description: As a registered user, I want to see a 'Forgot Password' option so that I can reset my password if I forget it.
acceptance_criteria: Given that I am on the login page, when I look at the options, then I should see a 'Forgot Password' option.
definition_of_done: 'Forgot Password' option is implemented and visible on the login page.
Unit tests for 'Forgot Password' option are written and passing.
Code for 'Forgot Password' option is reviewed and approved.
dependencies: User can log in with email and password

user_stories.title: User can reset password
user_stories.description: As a registered user, I want to reset my password so that I can regain access to my account if I forget my password.
acceptance_criteria: Given that I am a registered user and I have forgotten my password, when I enter my email in the 'Forgot Password' option, then I should receive an email to reset my password.
definition_of_done: Password reset functionality is implemented and tested.
Unit tests for password reset functionality are written and passing.
Code for password reset functionality is reviewed and approved.
